summary: THE FUEL INJECTION WIRING HARNESS HAS INSULATION THAT IS BADLY CRACKED AND   FLAKING OFF CAUSING FAULT CODES AND POOR RUNNING. THE BODY HARNESS HAS CRACKED  INSULATION AS WELL. WHILE THIS IS AN OLDER CAR IT IS LOW MILES AND HAS SPENT ITS  LIFE STORED INDOORS.  I HAVE A 1968 MODEL AMC CAR. THE WIRING IS FINE STILL. THIS WAS   A SERIOUS DESIGN FLAW FROM DAY ONE. IT WOULDN'T BE SO BAD IF THE REPLACEMENT   PART WAS NOT SO EXPENSIVE - 750 DOLLARS.   *TR
